/usr/bin/gcc  -fPIC  -msse -W -Wall  -O2 -g   -shared -Wl,-soname,liballegro_acodec.so.5.0 -o ../../lib/liballegro_acodec.so.5.0.7 CMakeFiles/allegro_acodec.dir/acodec.c.o CMakeFiles/allegro_acodec.dir/wav.c.o CMakeFiles/allegro_acodec.dir/flac.c.o CMakeFiles/allegro_acodec.dir/ogg.c.o ../../lib/liballegro_audio.so.5.0.7 -lFLAC -logg -lvorbisfile -lvorbis -logg ../../lib/liballegro.so.5.0.7 -lm -lpthread -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lXcursor -lXinerama -lXrandr -lXpm -lGL -lGLU -lpulse-simple -lpulse -lasound -lopenal -lvorbisfile -lvorbis -Wl,-rpath,/home/damien/workspace/battlechess/lib/allegro/lib
